description: Episode of Series "The Law". A drama based on a real life story, about a runaway girl and an uncaring mother. The film explores the duties of parents to protect their children from danger. Examines the rights of magistrates and judges to control a child's environment for what is seen to be the child's benefit. Director of Photography: John Seale
